tasks.label: Installing extensions and dependencies...
tasks.command: code-server --install-extension ms-python.python --install-extension ms-toolsai.jupyter --install-extension ms-toolsai.jupyter-keymap --install-extension ms-toolsai.jupyter-renderers --install-extension formulahendry.code-runner && cd /config/workspace/Phishing && pip install -r /config/workspace/Phishing/requirements.txt && export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:/config/workspace/Phishing
